title: Pasta salad with tuna and basil vinaigrette

ingredients.content: 30 g extra virgin olive oil, plus some extra to cook pasta
400 g dried penne pasta (or other short type pasta)
350 g canned tuna, in brine or water, drained
150 - 250 g cherry tomatoes, cut in halves

preparations.content: Place water, salt and a little olive oil in mixing bowl and heat <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add pasta and cook for <b>time indicated on packet/100°C/speed 1<b>. Drain pasta through Varoma dish. Transfer to a salad bowl and set aside.
Place olive oil and garlic in mixing bowl, chop <b>2 sec/speed 8<b> sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add tuna and mix <b>2 min/120°C/speed 1<b>. Remove, mix with pasta and tomato. Leave to cool.
Place basil, olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper and honey in mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Mix with pasta and serve immediately.
